name: PHASEChannelMixerDefinition
desc: An audio-layering object that routes sound directly to the device's output.

items.name: init(channelLayout: AVAudioChannelLayout)
items.desc: Creates a channel mixer with the given channel layout.

items.name: init(channelLayout: AVAudioChannelLayout, identifier: String)
items.desc: Creates a named channel mixer with the given channel layout.

items.name: var inputChannelLayout: AVAudioChannelLayout
items.desc: The channel layout of the mixer's input audio.
